value:
$WmMPID_チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Normal,Face|I was alone for so long, but today
has been like a wonderful dream.$k$pI've made more new friends than
I could have ever imagined! *sniff*$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Normal,Face|Don't cry, Tiki! I'll stay by your side
from now on. I'll make sure you're
never alone again. I promise.$k$p$Sbs1000|
